+Lucky Blessed Not only that, now she is Karthi wife, and even after 
divorce she will remain Karthi ex-wife, and I dont see it right from any 
angle to marry cousin's ex-wife , very awkward. Either poongodi can marry 
somebody else or stay as Karthi wife.
+m vijay I used to feel that way too but now I am beginning to like him.

+Bahma Siva lolz so true. i really dont care if poo marrys sara or not i 
just dont want here together with karti

+m vijay I guess we will be arguing this until cows come home but Poongodi 
had a choice. She made that choice and she should live with it,

+Lucky Blessed Respecting marriage is important, but not when one is forced 
into the marriage. but ur right karthi has finally realized his mistake.

agreed 100% and also our culture to respect marriage..pls. Kartik seem to 
be a nice and understanding guy....
As usual radhika mam is super, irrespective of either vaani or rani.﻿

Not sure why the directors insist on P's thali being the centerfold. they 
make her wear it out. and it gets longer and thicker by the day. 
Interesting she wears it out as she knows what and where she intends that 
piece of crap going as far as she is concerned ( as it is the cause of all 
her distress)
As for K appearing more likeable, well he figured playing a loser might 
help him get more brownie points with P ( hopefully).﻿

+Usha Meister
Also, just wanted to clarify here so that all those who comes hard on us 
for critizing some atrocities in the name of Tamil culture. I don't blame 
Tamil culture generally and I know its us people who "uses" tamil culture 
and in the name of "tamil culture" they get the things done for themselves. 
For eg., to make men and women stay in unhappy or abusive marriage no 
matter what,  parents to force their children to get married for monetary 
benefits and dismissing love marriage as sin and calling the act uncultured 
etc. The point I was trying to make about "Thali" is we have seen time and 
again as to how "Thali" is shown more sacred and important than human 
being's feelings in the name of Tamil culture. I was commenting that how 
Thali is focussed to remind Tamil people that Thali means life and hence 
hinting that Poongodi will need to be in that marriage. Thats what it makes 
me feel....While I appreciate so many good things in Tamil culture like 
hospitality, fidelity and so many other good things that has been taught in 
the Tamil literature (Eg., Thirukural) but yet we don't follow everything 
to the "T". It all boils down to someone's selfish needs be it parents, 
neighbours, society, leaders etc.

+Usha Meister
Had a good laugh again. Yes, its celluloid world. I think the amount of 
glamor exhibited in terms of clothes and jewelry is minimal compared to 
other Ekta Kapoor's serial that I happened to watch sometime back. VR's 
costume designer is still realistic and nice. It's just Poongodi's dressing 
is little bit too much for the present post wedding scenes. It contradicts, 
but no complaints, its still nice to see her all decked up with makeup and 
jewels. P's mom is a young woman in reality as I have seen her acting with 
Vijay a decade ago, so she might not want to potray old woman get up. As 
with the houses, some rich do still live in old houses like 4 kettu and 8 
kettu style of houses. But what I can't believe is Karthi sitting at home 
and Poongodi wasting her career. I guess they will make Karthi find a job 
in another city or something. Lets see..

+GMSunshine Tamil culture is not to be blamed Sunshine. It is the ppl who 
made this stupid rules and regulations.I know what you mean though when u 
say the writers are saying something.  I am not sure which present day girl 
actually wears a fresh LONGGGG YELLOW THALI ( I hated that shit)  but most 
of the time it is transferred to a gld chain. For a girl , like u say, 
about P who is not interested in this r'ship she dresses up seductively and 
for what reason I wonder?  Even that Malathi has a nice saree. That is why 
they call Celluloid world. PPl tend not to make the connection. In this 
episode, they are fairly wel off, yet the home that is shown is run down, a 
danda choru sits and ebings no income.,. god knows what the father does, 
yet they always have money to buy vegetables and make food.  My mother's 
maid back in Inndia has a washing machine, a fridge, cell phone. Yet these 
so called rich dont have much in the form of anything and they show P makig 
orange juice for thatha.

K is putting on this PAVAM face but i am telling you he will not do 
anything to help P> No shame for him to ask for juice from P when he knows 
her feelings. He is trying, Let him try; I hope he gets a tight slap on his 
face. When he comes on i fast forward.

Look at P's mom,  she is also over dressed with jewels and always looks 
like she is ready to go to the movies. He hubby doesnt earn much, they live 
in a DHANAM house kind courtesy Bhoomi, yet they live like royalty. NO 
shame for that entire bunch.

+Usha Meister
Usha, I was thinking the same all this while. They show the families are so 
educated but yet Poongodi with an engineering degree I believe is sitting 
at home? I don't understand why Karthi is sitting at home either. Thats 
totally unbelievable and no words to even comment. Who sits at home these 
days unless you are super rich. These serials wants to show that its ok to 
show young men and women to sit at home like you say "danda choru" if you 
are rich? Karthi's behavior is like I will show sad face, play victim and 
try and see what happens. Not sure he not acting in finding Saravana as he 
promised. Don't know what the writers are up to with this Poongodi story. 
She is now playing nice to Thatha to make sure he recuperates. We don't 
know how long.

Poongodi's look after the wedding is more like a happy newly wed girl all 
dressing up with colorful sarees and matching Jewellery with the Thali is 
still in yellow rope and is out all the time. She doesn't dress like an 
unhappy bride although I like girls dressing up no matter what but is 
usually won't be the case in real life. May be the writers are trying to 
remind the "audience" of Thali culture of Indians.

+Raji Prasanna In our day to day lives we go to work, if young  or a 
student study. U are right in asking why K does not go to work ( DANDHA 
CHORU).  As for P yes she can pursue her studies. Go in the footsteps of 
her periamma  and be a lawyer who takes up cases of Abused women, Needy 
women. or be a social worker. She has the right approach in saying things 
the way it shd be. Such brains lost on a stupid K who is a real danda choru.

It is the older women and the elderly at home that create these stupid 
traditions.  I broke all traditions, am a very happy person and stand on my 
own 2 legs. Never waited for hand me downs nor for crumbs thrown my way. 
India will only be prosperous, the day it moves forward by questioning 
tradition, going for higher studies, giving women equal rights and respect 
in society. Man does something it is overlooked - same thing woman does 
something the entire community and relatives are like flies sitting on 
crap.  I watch these for fun when i am designing systems or day trading in 
the stock market as it is boring to listen to the analysts not decide which 
way the market is going. Tired of watching CNBC so these serials provide me 
with company and laughter

Totally agree with you.All the Tamil serials are so full of women putting 
up with crap dished up by men and the older females advising them to 
conform to old traditions.If Poongodi wants to get out of marriage she 
should do so and by the way why can't she continue her studies?And why is 
Karthi always at home? Weird..
எங்கே சார் பிடிச்சிங்க இந்த கல்லுளி மங்கனை நல்ல நடிப்பு......﻿
Arumugam is blady annoying...﻿
Arumugam is funny:)﻿
He is an idiot
just love this background music on the End, made for Poonkodi's situation! ﻿
Pls open the you tube﻿

Once again Swamy has shown what an idiot he is. How could anyone be so 
petty so as to think that Vani's presents were to show him up? On the other 
hand, if Vani did not bring anything, Swamy would have been contemptuous. 
Instead of thinking how much happiness it would have brought Selvi and 
Rajesh, he is more interested in his newly-found self-respect. Arumugam is 
so annoying. I would have slapped him. Poongodi's story - God knows where 
this is going - but I definitely dont want her to get back to Sara, a 
selfish and uncaring brute. I think Karthik is so much better. At least he 
is fighting for her.﻿
me 3rd﻿

Poo should not join with karthi. Then is serial will be like every other 
serial. plus they shouldn't join cause this will show its ok to force one 
and marry. i would really dislike this serial if poo and karthi gets 
together .﻿

Vijay, totally agree. She should not join with Karthi and teach all those 
parents out there to blackmail, fall in their children's feet. I hate 
Poongodi living there still. She has to make her mind up and leave soon. 
Well, what can I say all this dragging is because this is a MEGA DRAMA. 
What else can we expect.

+Usha Meister
True, mistakes CAN be corrected. It's never too late. This is like showing 
when you are not that well off you don't deserve a good girl and just live 
a life with things that you think you don't deserve.. Not true, there is no 
real acceptable reason for Saravana to deny to get married to Poongodi. He 
was delusional and was not strong enough to be bold, confident young man. 
On the other hand Poongodi was stupid as well to get married to someone she 
 knew she can't live with. The whole Poo and Sara story doesn't teach a 
single good thing. It's al made that way for a sensational story thats all. 
 And if anyone says that Sara sacrificed for his family and Poo sacrificed 
for her father is a total BS. They just did a stupid inexperienced mistake. 
That CAN be corrected and have to be corrected. You don't have to waste 
your full happy life ahead for a stupid mistake you did in your young age.

what separates a serial is its strength in being able to bring more forward 
thinking thoughts and valuable lessons to younger generations getting mixed 
msgs through media which is the centrefold for most households. Poongodi 
shd stand on her own atleast for sanity and decide down the road what is 
good for her. Mistakes shd not be covered by rebounding in another's arms. 
 The Rani household is problem ridden so that if fixed will unfix a lot of 
other problems.

that old woman shd stay out within his role and not use his current , 
convenient illness to blackmail P
True
Me 4﻿

She will accept karthik as husband and learn to forget sara that is how the 
story will end﻿

today nyt the conversation b/w poon and karthi in bedroom will decide 
whether poon going to accept karthi or going to prove her true love on 
saravana...viwers dont watch vani rani after poon accept karthi...our 
college guys decided to dont watch vani rani...coz of thatha emotional

Arumugam, he reminds me traces of Rajini in his very early years of 
"Avargal"﻿

karthi will get poongodi.Same old story. Saravanan is coward and Rani is 
irritating. Arumugam is good in his character. Vani should have thought 
about Sami 's behaviour much before. Just make Poongodi separate from 
karthi otherwise it will make viewers and those who expeected a real new 
end a fool for watching all these months.﻿

Back in Canada. Cannot go to sleep without my dose of V & R. 

IN all families there is one overly disturbing member and Arumugam fills 
that role of the cheap bum. Wonder why these creatures are even born that 
live off of others money. Shameless. He shd be killed and his organs 
donated to some needy people who will make this world a better place. His 
wife shd  kill him. Once Kali comes hopefully this menace will be out of 
the house

Rani excels in her role. 

Thatha is a real needling character. There is no need for him to bring up S 
and start all this. Adding fuel to fire. If P ever settles down for K , 
there is ONLY WORD FOR THIS SERIAL. STEREOTYPE.

We are gng to see a lot more of these filler scenes for sure to drag it on. 
Wish Radhika will come out with some shocking material and controversial 
storyline rather than tow the line.﻿

+Usha Meister
Usha, I really had a good laugh with those typical dialogues that happen in 
Tamil families. Very true. And yes, hopefully it all should change.

+GMSunshine It is called cheap thrills.  If u see it is these old fools 
that giggle and cackle when it is first night scene and take so much pride 
in talking about it. it is these old ones that are the meddlesome ones in 
the story.  YOU know there are 4 things they say very effectively. My tamil 
is good but when i write it in english it will come across funny. Also i am 
not a full tamilian.. I am a palghat Iyer so there will be some words that 
might look out of lace. okay here i go

1. Nee paneratha patha kersosene uthindu sahalam pole iruku.
2. Ennai paneranu nenachupathaya. Nanga thalia thonge potutundu ponam. 
Epadi thalaiye thookindu nadapom
3. Avan enam chonalum,, cheythalum nee poruthundu ketukanam and nee avanai 
mathanam.
4, Nan sethupona, athu onala than irukum.. Nee nana iru. Nangalam ekadu 
ketu porum. Ne poi nana iru. Thripthiya.. Onne chinathale konukanam

Well this is  the dram that takes place in most families.

All i say is I did not study Psychology as my main was in Literature and 
computer science later. But having read so many books on psychology i can 
proudly say this

"Behind every woman's sorrow is a family. Behind every tear shed by an 
abused woman is a hoard of such people as there is a tale that no one wants 
to hear or indulge in SELECTIVE MUTISM and SELECTIVE HEARING"..  

Hopefully the world will change for a better place and education always 
provides ppl with wisdom rather than learning from dumb serials on TV and 
movies

Good comment Usha. That Thatha is a true Indian old fart. Talking about 
Saravanan's wedding in front of Poongodi so soon. This is a typical 
psychological approach that these old people take with the kids. They knew 
that Poongodi cannot change overnight. But still he thinks if you talk 
about getting Saravanan married to another girl,  then it will send an 
indirect message and warning to Poongodi that she should forget him totally 
and that she will never get Saravanan. These old farts don't care about 
youngster's feelings. Even if she changes to accept Karthi for his sake, 
won't these old farts know she will still be affected and won't be all 
happy to live with Karthi or see Saravanan getting married to another girl. 
This I called emotional intimidation, ridiculing a girl who failed totally 
in front of them. Those kinda old fashioned people get a secret happiness 
in seeing young people failing...
Fist! ﻿
Super drama..i love the drama..﻿
